constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Park Road Conservation Area

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non-Material amendment of Planning Permission 16/13066/HOU (Erection of single storey side and rear extension and upgrading of original dwelling) dated 16/12/2016.  (Please see Statement provided for proposed alterations)
decision_conditions: Officers considers that the proposed changes are materially different to those approved under planning permission 16/13066/HOU. As such, the S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused.

Whether or not a proposed amendment is considered to be non-material will depend on the circumstances of the case. There is no statutory definition of 'non material'. This is because it will be dependent on the context of the overall scheme - what may be non-material in one context may be material in another. Whether or not a change can be considered as a "non-material amendment" may be defined according to established legal concepts of materiality and de minimis. The local planning authority must have regard to the effect of the change, together with any previous changes made under section 96A. The local planning authority does not assess the acceptability of the proposed amendment but its magnitude.
Please provide Proposed Elevation with an annotated dimension to a scale of 1:20 or 1:50 or 1:100 in colour showing the method of illumination (if applicable).
